infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is required for AR-guided first aid instructions and real-time visual feedback during emergency procedures.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access enables voice commands and audio instructions during emergency situations when hands-free operation is critical.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo library access allows you to attach relevant medical images to emergency reports for first responders.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Permission to save photos enables documenting emergency situations and procedures for medical professionals.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location access helps emergency services locate you more quickly during 911 calls and provides relevant local emergency information.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Speech recognition enables hands-free voice commands during emergency situations when precise operation is critical for Aidra.
